Miami_Beach.Centro Lofts: Centro Lofts in a high-rise loft condominium project in Downtown CBD of Miami, Florida. Construction began in December 2013, and the project opened in mid 2016. The project, which has 352 units, is unique for being one of the few modern buildings in the downtown Miami area, along with The Loft and The Loft 2, to have no parking garage.
